data.name: Walmart egift Voucher
data.description: The Walmart eGift Card is the perfect present for anyone. Walmart features a great selection of high-quality merchandise, friendly service, and, of course, Every Day Low Prices. Shop in-store or online at www.walmart.com. Save Money. Live better.
data.termsAndConditionsInstructions: For balance inquiry, call or go to Walmart.com/giftcards or samsclub.com. Use this card for purchases of merchandise and services at any retail or on-line format of Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. in the U.S. or Puerto Rico, including Sam
data.redemptionInstructions:
IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS
1. The Gift Card (voucher) can be used online
2. The Gift Card (voucher) can not be refunded.
3. Gift cards (vouchers) cannot be used to purchase gift cards.
4. Gift cards (vouchers) cannot be exchanged for cash.
HOW TO REDEEM YOUR GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
1. Visit www.walmart.com on your computer or mobile device, or visit your closest outlet.
2. Enter your Walmart Gift Card (voucher) number and access number when checking out. 
3. Your eGiftCard will automatically be applied. 
HOW TO BUY AN WALMART GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
Walmart Gift Cards (vouchers) are available on the Xoxoday Store website/Mobile application. 
1. Visit the Xoxoday Store website/WalmartUSA: View and select from the vouchers available.
2. Select your preferred denomination and checkout: You can choose the denomination/s of your preference from those available.
3. Pay via Debit/ Credit/ Net Banking or Xoxoday Voucher/Points: Enter your preferred mode of payment and purchase the Gift Cards (vouchers).
WALMART GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR OCCASIONS
With exciting deals running on various clothes and home goods, grocery and appliances and more, The Walmart makes catering to your every need even more enjoyable no matter what the occasion is. And the prices are to die for. Plan your perfect layouts and furniture settings for your house. Walmart has it all. Such a diverse range of options makes Walmart gift cards (vouchers) the best gift one could ask for. Rather than giving them a generic cliched gift, give them the chance to choose their favourite item with the help of gift cards (vouchers). Go for Walmart gift cards (vouchers) for Valentines Day, Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Childrens Day, your anniversary or birthday. Bring a smile on your loved ones faces with a thoughtful gifting option for every occasion.
WALMART GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR CORPORATE GIFTING
Cannot make your mind about the right corporate gift? How about Walmart gift cards (vouchers) for your employees, clients and partners? With Walmart gift cards (vouchers), you leave the choice up to them to pick their preferred products. You also give them the option of using the gift cards (vouchers) to buy something for their loved ones. Or for themselves. Use Walmart gift cards (vouchers) to give your co-workers unconventional gifts this year. A gift should be loved by the recipient after all. And we can guarantee that Walmart gift cards (vouchers)would absolutely be loved in your organisation!
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
How Can I return/Cancel The Walmart Gift Cards (vouchers) which I have redeemed?
Regret that it is not possible. Gift Cards (vouchers) once redeemed/bought cannot be cancelled or returned.
Where can I use my Walmart Gift Card (voucher)?
You can use your Walmart gift card (voucher) on the website or in listed outlets.
Can I buy an Walmart Gift Card (voucher) Using my XOXO VOUCHER/POINTS?
Yes, you can buy an Walmart Gift Card (voucher) using XOXO VOUCHER/POINTS.
How can I know the status of my Walmart Gift Cards (vouchers)?
Yes of course! Enter your voucher code in the Voucher Detail section. You will know the status of your Walmart Gift Card (voucher). Alternately, you may also call at +91 80-61915050 or visit https://plum-support.xoxoday.com/support/home

data.name: Starbucks USA eGift Card
data.description: Starbucks coffeehouses have become a beacon for coffee lovers everywhere because you can count on genuine service, an inviting atmosphere and a superb cup of expertly roasted and richly brewed coffee every time.
data.termsAndConditionsInstructions: Reload your eGift and check your balance at participating Starbucks stores, www.starbucks.com/card or 1-800-782-7282. Your Starbucks Card eGift may only be used for making purchases at participating Starbucks stores. It cannot be redeemed for cash unless required by law. Refunds can only be provided for unused eGifts with the original receipt. This eGift does not expire, nor does Starbucks charge fees. Complete terms and conditions available on our website. Use of this eGift constitutes acceptance of these terms and conditions. Treat this eGift like Cash.
data.redemptionInstructions:
IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS
Gift Cards (vouchers) cannot be used online.
Multiple Gift Cards (vouchers) can be used in one bill.
Gift Cards (vouchers) can not be used for Meal Combos.
Gift Cards (vouchers) are accepted at all Listed Outlets.
HOW TO REDEEM YOUR GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
1. Check the outlet locator for a Starbucks outlet near you that accepts this gift card (voucher).
2. Outlet locator - https://www.starbucks.com/store-locator?map=39.635307,-101.337891,5z
3. Order your preferred products.
4. Show your gift card (voucher) at the time of billing to redeem.
HOW TO BUY A STARBUCKS GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?

2. Select your preferred denominations and checkout: You can choose the denomination/s of your preference from those available.
3. Pay via Debit/ Credit/ Net Banking or Xoxoday Voucher/Points: Enter your preferred mode of payment and purchase the Gift Card (vouchers).
HOW TO SAVE MONEY WITH STARBUCKS GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
Do not want to stay in on a bright, sunny day? Choose a Starbucks cafe. You can sit back and relax while enjoying tasty, authentic coffee. Appreciate the ambience and you will not even realise the passage of time. And once the order arrives, nothing will distract you. You can order one of their hazelnut lattes or a frappuccino. When the bill arrives, you will be more than happy to leave a hefty tip.
STARBUCKS GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR OCCASIONS
Do you not think people get bored of receiving clothes, shoes or accessories? But does anyone turn down a chance to relax at an amazing cafe? Not many would say no to free coffee. So, next time you get stuck while selecting a gift, choose Starbucks gift cards (vouchers). People find it difficult to choose gifts, especially during the festive season. Rather than gifting your loved ones dry fruits, choose Starbucks gift cards (vouchers). And give them the chance to choose their own gifts. With Starbucks gift cards (vouchers), the probability of them dumping your gifts will become naught. So go for Starbucks gift cards (vouchers) for Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Childrens Day, Valentines Day, your anniversary or birthday. Your loved ones will consider you thoughtful. And you will be getting better gifts on your birthday.
STARBUCKS GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR CORPORATE GIFTING
Tired of gifting office stationery, clothes or footwear as corporate holiday presents? How about Starbucks gift cards (vouchers) for your clients, partners and employees? With Starbucks gift cards (vouchers), you leave the choice up to them. You give them the option of using the gift card (voucher) to buy some amazing coffee for their loved ones. Or for themselves. Use Starbucks gift cards (vouchers), and you will remove the possibility of your gift ending in the bin. Your clients will not get a more thoughtful gift this holiday season. And they will tell you the same.
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
How Can I return/cancel Starbucks Gift Cards (vouchers) which I have redeemed?
Regret that it is not possible. Gift Cards (vouchers) once redeemed/bought cannot be cancelled or returned.

data.name: Delta Air Lines eGift Card
data.description: Give the gift of travel. Choose to send a Delta eGift Card and prepare for a big thank you. They can be used toward airfare at delta.com, at the airport, through Reservations or by phone with Delta Vacations
data.redemptionInstructions:
IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS
1. Gift Vouchers CAN be used Online
2. Multiple Gift Vouchers CAN be used in one bill.
3. Gift Vouchers CAN be clubbed with ongoing promotions.
HOW TO REDEEM YOUR GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
Redeem online:
1. Go to this URL: www.delta.com/redeem
2. At checkout, enter Card Number and PIN Number.
Redeem Onboard:
1. Print a copy of your digital gift card and show it at the airport while purchasing your ticket.
Redeem Over the Phone:
1. Call Delta Air Lines Reservations and advise the agent that you are redeeming an eGift or a Card. 
2. In the U.S. and Canada, call 800-221-1212 or 800-225-2525.      
3. In Japan, call 0570-077733 or 0476-31-8000.
4. In all other countries, call the local Delta Air Lines Reservations office.
Redeem with a Travel Consultant:
1. When making a payment towards your flight, contact your Travel Consultant and provide them with Card Number and PIN.
HOW TO BUY A DELTA GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
Delta Gift Cards (vouchers) are available on the Xoxoday Store website/Mobile application. You can purchase these Gift Vouchers by using Net Banking, Credit and Debit Cards.
1. Visit the Xoxoday Store website/DeltaUSA: View and select from the available vouchers.
2. Select your preferred denominations and checkout: You can choose the denomination/s of your preference from those available.
3. Pay via Debit/ Credit/ Net Banking or Xoxoday Voucher/Points: Enter your preferred mode of payment and purchase the Gift Cards (vouchers).
DELTA GIFT CARD (VOUCHER) FOR OCCASIONS
This festive season, get the maximum benefits out of Delta. No matter where you want to go, they always have the flight you are looking for. Such a diverse collection of flights and travel destinations and so much more makes Delta gift vouchers the best gift one could ask for. Rather than giving them a generic cliched gift, give them the chance to travel big with the help of gift cards. Go for Delta gift cards (voucher) for Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Childrens Day, Valentines Day, your anniversary or birthday. Bring a smile on your loved ones faces with a thoughtful gifting option for every occasion.
DELTA GIFT CARD (VOUCHER) FOR CORPORATE GIFTING
Cannot make your mind about the right corporate Holiday gift? How about Delta gift cards (vouchers) for your employees, clients and partners? With Delta gift cards, you leave the choice up to them to pick their preferred airplane for their trips to their favorite locations. You also give them the option of using the gift cards to pamper their loved ones. Or themselves. Use Delta gift cards (vouchers) to give your co-workers unconventional gifts this year. A gift should be loved by the recipient after all. And we can guarantee that  Delta gift cards (vouchers) would absolutely be loved in your organisation!
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
How Can I return/Cancel a Delta Gift Card (voucher) which I have redeemed?
Regret that it is not possible. Gift cards (vouchers) once redeemed/bought cannot be cancelled or returned.

You can use your Delta gift card (voucher) on the website, at the airport or over the phone.

data.name: Xbox Digital USA eGift Voucher
data.description:
NO EXPIRATION DATE OR SERVICE FEES

* Works at Microsoft Store on Xbox consoles (Xbox Live required), Windows 10 PCs, and online. Not redeemable in physical stores
data.termsAndConditionsInstructions: Once redeemed to your U.S. Microsoft account, the full code value will be applied and may be used for eligible purchases (exclusions apply) made directly at select Microsoft digital stores. Eligible purchases and prices vary by region, device, and over time. Geographic limitations, country and balance restrictions, taxes, and internet connection fees may apply. Paid subscriptions required for some content. Age restrictions apply. Except as required by law, codes cannot be redeemed or exchanged for cash and are not reloadable or refundable. To create a new Microsoft account or read full terms (which may change without notice), go to microsoft.com/cardterms. Void where prohibited or restricted by law. Cards and codes issued by and
data.redemptionInstructions:
IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS
1. The Gift Card (voucher) has no expiration date.
2. Gift Cards (vouchers) CAN be used in your U.S. Microsoft account. 
3. Gift Cards (vouchers) CANNOT be used as cash.
HOW TO REDEEM YOUR GIFT CARD?
1. To get started, click on the Redemption URL provided. 
2. The resulting landing page will provide your Digital Code as well as redemption instructions. 
3. Redeem your code to your U.S. Microsoft account. 
4. Simply login to your account and enter the 25-digit card number. 
5. To create a new account, visit https://commerce.microsoft.com  
6. You must be 13+. 
7. The full code value will be applied to your Microsoft account and may be used for eligible purchases (exclusions apply) made directly at Xbox Games, Xbox Music, Xbox Video, and other select Microsoft online stores. 
8. Geography limitations and balance restrictions apply. 
9. Eligible purchases and prices may vary by region, device, and over time. 
HOW TO BUY A XBOX GIFT CARD?
XBox Gift Cards (vouchers) are available on the Xoxoday Store website/Mobile application. You can purchase these Gift Vouchers by using Net Banking, Credit and Debit Cards.
1. Visit Xoxoday Store website/XBox: View and select from the available vouchers of XBox.
2. Select your preferred denominations and checkout: You can choose the denomination/s of your preference from those available.
3. Pay via Debit/ Credit/ Net Banking or Xoxoday Voucher/Points: Enter your preferred mode of payment and purchase the Gift Cards (vouchers).

You can avail the XBox Gift Cards (vouchers) to book your game, or gift those to your near and dear ones so that they can choose what they want to buy. What is more, is that you shall be remembered for your thoughtfulness, and can expect reciprocation in kind.

HOW TO BUY A WHOLE FOODS MARKET GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
Whole Foods Market Gift Cards (vouchers) are available on the Xoxoday Store website/Mobile application. You can purchase these Gift Cards (vouchers) by using Net Banking, Credit and Debit Cards.
1. Visit the Xoxoday Store website/WholeFoodsMarketUSA: View and select from the gift cards (vouchers) available.
2. Select your preferred denominations and checkout: You can choose the denomination/s of your preference from those available.
3. Pay via Debit/ Credit/ Net Banking or Xoxoday Voucher/Points: Enter your preferred mode of payment and purchase the Gift Card (vouchers).
HOW TO SAVE MONEY WITH A WHOLE FOODS MARKET GIFT CARD (VOUCHER)?
Do you not want to stay in and order unhealthy food online? Choose a Whole Foods Market outlet to get all your kitchen needs. You can select whatever you require at a discounted price. Appreciate the convenience and you will not even realise the passage of time. And once the ingredients are ready, nothing will distract you. By the end of your meal, you will be more than happy to shop here again.
WHOLE FOODS MARKET GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR OCCASIONS
Next time you get stuck while selecting a gift, choose Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers). People find it difficult to choose gifts, especially during the festive season. Rather than gifting your loved ones dry fruits, choose Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers). And give them the chance to choose their soups and greens. With Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers), the probability of them dumping your gifts will become naught. So go for Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers) for Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Childrens Day, Valentines Day, your anniversary or birthday. Your loved ones will consider you thoughtful. And you will be getting better gifts on your birthday.
WHOLE FOODS MARKET GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR CORPORATE GIFTING
Tired of gifting office stationery, clothes or footwear as corporate holiday presents? How about Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers) for your clients, partners and employees? With Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers), you leave the choice up to them. You give them the option of using the gift card (voucher) to buy some amazing food for their loved ones. Or for themselves. Use Whole Foods Market gift cards (vouchers), and you will remove the possibility of your gift ending in the bin. Your clients will not get a more thoughtful gift this holiday season. And they will tell you the same.
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
How Can I return/Cancel Whole Foods Market Gift Cards (vouchers) which I have redeemed?
Regret that it is not possible. Gift Cards (vouchers) once redeemed/bought cannot be cancelled or returned.
Where can I use my Whole Foods Market Gift Card (voucher)?
You can use your Whole Foods Market gift card (voucher) in the listed outlets.
Can I buy a Whole Foods Market Gift Card (voucher) Using my XOXO VOUCHER/POINTS?
Yes, you can buy a Whole Foods Market Gift Card (voucher) using XOXO VOUCHER/POINTS.
How can I know the status of my Whole Foods Market Gift Cards (vouchers)?
Yes of course! Enter your voucher code in the Voucher Detail section. You will know the status of your Whole Foods Market Gift Card (voucher). Alternately, you may also call at +91 80-61915050 or visit https://plum-support.xoxoday.com/support/home

IMPORTANT INSTRUCTIONS
1. Gift Cards (vouchers) cannot be used online.

And once the order arrives, nothing will distract you. You can order one of their chicken burgers or a fresh beverage. When the bill arrives, you will be more than happy to leave a hefty tip.
BK GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR OCCASIONS

So, next time you get stuck while selecting a gift, choose BK gift cards (vouchers). People find it difficult to choose gifts, especially during the festive season. Rather than gifting your loved ones dry fruits, choose BK gift cards (vouchers). And give them the chance to choose their own gifts. With BK gift cards (vouchers), the probability of them dumping your gifts will become naught. So go for BK gift cards (vouchers) for Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Childrens Day, Valentines Day, your anniversary or birthday. Your loved ones will consider you thoughtful. And you will be getting better gifts on your birthday.
BK GIFT CARDS (VOUCHERS) FOR CORPORATE GIFTING
Tired of gifting office stationery, clothes or footwear as corporate holiday presents? How about BK gift cards (vouchers) for your clients, partners and employees? With BK gift cards (vouchers), you leave the choice up to them. You give them the option of using the gift card (voucher) to buy some amazing food for their loved ones. Or for themselves. Use BK gift cards (vouchers), and you will remove the possibility of your gift ending in the bin. Your clients will not get a more thoughtful gift this holiday season. And they will tell you the same.
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
How Can I return/cancel BK Gift Cards (vouchers) which I have redeemed?
Regret that it is not possible. Gift Cards (vouchers) once redeemed/bought cannot be cancelled or returned.
